perturbation.original_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time with 30 days written notice.
perturbation.changed_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement only with 30 days written notice and upon mutual written consent of both parties. If such consent is not provided, the agreement remains in effect for the full 12-month term.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that either party can terminate with 30 days' notice. The changed text introduces a contradiction by requiring mutual written consent for termination, essentially negating the 'at any time' clause and creating uncertainty about the termination conditions.

perturbation.original_text: UTK shall not divulge to others, any trade secret or confidential information, knowledge, or data concerning or pertaining to the business and affairs of AVDU, obtained by UTK as a result of its engagement hereunder, unless authorized, in writing by AVDU. UTK represents and warrants that it has established appropriate internal procedures for protecting the trade secrets and confidential information of AVDU, including, without limitation, restrictions on disclosure of such information to employees and other persons who may be engaged in such information to employees and other persons who may be engaged in rendering services to any person, firm or entity which may be a competitor of AVDU.
perturbation.changed_text: UTK shall not divulge to others, any trade secret or confidential information, knowledge, or data concerning or pertaining to the business and affairs of AVDU, obtained by UTK as a result of its engagement hereunder, unless authorized, in writing by AVDU. Notwithstanding the foregoing, UTK is permitted to share confidential information with potential investors and partners for the purpose of securing funding or strategic alliances, even if such entities might be considered competitors of AVDU. UTK represents and warrants that it has established appropriate internal procedures for protecting the trade secrets and confidential information of AVDU, including, without limitation, restrictions on disclosure of such information to employees and other persons who may be engaged in such information to employees and other persons who may be engaged in rendering services to any person, firm or entity which may be a competitor of AVDU.
perturbation.explanation: The original text strictly prohibits UTK from divulging confidential information. The modified text introduces an exception, allowing UTK to share confidential information with potential investors and partners, even if they are competitors. This directly contradicts the initial prohibition and creates uncertainty about the scope of confidentiality.

perturbation.original_text: AVDU agrees that for a twenty four months (24) following the execution of this Agreement, AVDU shall not, without UTEK's prior written consent, directly or indirectly solicit for employment any present employee of UTEK, or request induce or advise any employee of UTEK to leave the employ of UTEK. In turn, UTEK agrees that it will not directly or indirectly solicit any present employee of AVDU.
perturbation.changed_text: AVDU agrees that for a twenty four months (24) following the execution of this Agreement, AVDU shall not, without UTEK's prior written consent, directly or indirectly solicit for employment any present employee of UTEK, or request induce or advise any employee of UTEK to leave the employ of UTEK. UTEK may solicit employees of AVDU, but shall only do so with the consent of said employees.
perturbation.explanation: The original text provides a mutual agreement not to solicit employees. The modification maintains the restriction on AVDU, but removes it for UTK, allowing UTK to solicit AVDU employees as long as the employees consent. This creates an imbalance and a contradiction in the non-solicitation agreement.
perturbation.location: IX. OTHER MATERIAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS
